import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { checkAuthorization, getUserDetails } from '../utils' class AddBuilding extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { user:{}, form:{ name:'', total_floors:'', total_apartments:'', address:{ address1:'', address2:'', pincode:'' }, registered_owner_name:'', floors:[{ 'floor_no':'', 'apartments':'', 'details':[{ 'apartment_no':'', 'is_vacant':true, 'type':'', 'rent_amount':0, 'security_amount':0, 'maintenance_charges':0, 'electricity_charges':0, 'water_charges':0, 'gas_charges':0, 'amenities':{}, "tenants_allowed":0, "tenants":[{ "tenant_id":"", "start_date":"", "end_date":"" }] }] }] } } } componentDidMount(){ checkAuthorization(this.props); let details = getUserDetails(); this.setState({user:details}); }; render() { return (
